Package au.edu.anu.omhtk.preferences

package au.edu.anu.omhtk.preferences
This package enhances Preferences to handle arrays converted to Strings.

As implemented here PrefImpl, the backing store is ignored and the data is saved to a specified file when flushed.

The intention is that preference data can be saved along with file specific data for an application session so the appearance of the application is stored with that particular session of which there can be any number. *

Author:
Ian Davies - Dec 11, 2018
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    IPreferences
    Interface for the preferences system.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Preferences
    This static class is a wrapper for any implementations of IPreferences.
    PrefImpl
    This implementation of IPreferences is a wrapper class for Preferences.
